titles.title: Taxpayer Receipt Act
To require the Secretary of the Treasury to provide estimates of the use of taxpayer funds by the United States Government, and for other purposes.
Taxpayer Receipt Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary:
Taxpayer Receipt Act
This bill requires the Department of the Treasury to provide to each taxpayer a one-page estimate of how such taxpayer's money was spent by the government during the immediately preceding calendar year.
